power.title: Amoth's Grace
power.fluff: Through Amoth's power, you channel strength to your allies, allowing them to stand fast against evil

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: You or an ally within range are either subject to a critical hit or bloodied by an attack

element.name: Target:
element.text: The triggering creature

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Ancestral Guidance
power.fluff: You call upon the ancestor spirits to guide your path

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: You make a skill check and dislike the result

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You gain a power bonus to the triggering roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Angharradh's Favor
power.fluff: Angharradh blesses those who show resolve and determination in the face of evil

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: You or an ally within range succeeds on a saving throw

element.name: Target:
element.text: One ally

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target gains a +4 power bonus to saving throws until the end of his or her next turn.

power.title: Anthem of Civilization
power.fluff: You inspire your allies to work in concert to turn the tide of battle

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Target:
element.text: You, or one ally in the burst

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against any enemy he or she flanks.

power.title: Arawai's Abundance
power.fluff: Araway shelters those who receive her blessings

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Target:
element.text: One ally in the burst

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
In addition, the target gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Arcana Ward
power.fluff: Your god's comprehension of arcane mysteries extends to shielding you from them

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: You would take damage from an Arcane attack or other source

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist 5 to all damage from attacks and other sources with the Arcane keyword.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: Resist 10.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: Resist 15.

power.title: Armor of Bahamut
power.fluff: Bahamut protects you or a friend from devastating harm

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: An enemy scores a critical hit against you or an ally within range

element.name: Target:
element.text: The triggering attack

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The critical hit becomes a normal hit.

power.title: Asmodeus's Fiery Command
power.fluff: Asmodeus rewards those who please him and destroys those who fail

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Target:
element.text: One ally in the burst

element.name: Effect:
element.text: If the target hits and enemy with an attack before the end of his or her next turn, the attack deals an additional 5 fire damage, and the target gains 5 temporary hit points.
If the target does not hit with an attack before the end of his or her next turn, the target and each creature adjacent to him or her take 5 fire damage.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: 10 fire damage or temporary hit points.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: 15 fire damage or temporary hit points.

power.title: Aureon's Instruction
power.fluff: You tap into Aureon's vast wisdom to aid in your research and understanding

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, when you make a knowledge or monster knowledge check you make two rolls and use the higher result.

power.title: Avandra's Rescue
power.fluff: Avandra smiles upon you and helps you rescrue a friend in need

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Target:
element.text: One ally who is the same size as you or smaller

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You slide both you and the target 1 square, swapping positions.

power.title: Balinor's Prey
power.fluff: The hunt is sweet, but the kill is sweeter

element.name: Channel Divinity:
element.text: You can only use one Channel Divinity power per encounter

element.name: Target:
element.text: One creature

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The next melee or ranged attack that hits the target before the end of your next turn deals 1d6 additional damage.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: 2d6 additional damage.

element.name: Level 21:
element.text: 3d6 additional damage.
